sentence: Breaking news out of Mexico late Tuesday night Sept. 7 as the New York Times and others report that a major earthquake measuring at least 7.0 hit near the popular tourist town of Acapulco.
label: resilience

sentence: Reuters reporting that there are several damaged buildings in Acapulco.
label: buildings

sentence: According to Reuters, the United States Geological Service pegs the quake’s epicenter as just 11 miles northeast of the city.
label: resilience

sentence: There were widespread reports of power outages and major shaking being reported as far away as Mexico City.
label: resilience

sentence: The U.S. Tsunami warning system said a tsunami threat was issued, but so far no reports of damaging tsunami waves.
label: resilience

sentence: There have already been several aftershocks as well.
label: buildings

sentence: So far, just one person is reported to have been killed.
label: resilience

sentence: Featured image by Francisco Robles/AFP via Getty Images.
label: other

label: other
